bibl.title: Between Magic and Medicine: The Iatromagical Formularies and Medical Receptaries on Papyri Compared.
bibl.note: Paper presented at the workshop ""The Works of the Medical Profession in Antiquity: Genres and Purposes"" held at the University of Oslo, September 16th-18th, 2010. - I. Iatromagical formularies: A. The prescriptions; - B. Lectional marks, punctuation, critical notations and bookhands; - C. Types of copies. - II. Level of knowledge: A. Quotations of authors; - B. The vocabulary of pathology; - C. Pharmacopoeia.
bibl.seg: Magali de Haro Sanchez, Between Magic and Medicine: The Iatromagical Formularies and Medical Receptaries on Papyri Compared.

Paper presented at the workshop ""The Works of the Medical Profession in Antiquity: Genres and Purposes"" held at the University of Oslo, September 16th-18th, 2010. - I. Iatromagical formularies: A.
